Text:
Don't Trust The Bitch in Apartment 23

Was cancelled by ABC and they said not will air
the last 8 episodes remaining from season 2.

But in 8TV appears today Januray, 23th will air
this TV Series at 11pm
Looking for 8TV in the social networks for more information about this topic, thanks

The 8 unaired "Apartment 23" eps will air in Oz

This is a "heads-up" post to the amazing crew of torrent uploaders...

The last 8 episodes of "Don't Trust the B---- in Apartment 23" that ABC has yet to air after it unceremoniously cancelled the series are scheduled to be shown on Australia's Arena channel on Mondays beginning March 25.

There are many Apartment 23 fans who would be very grateful if these become available at TPB!

Ref: http://www.tvtonight.com.au/2013/03/aren...re-us.html

The FOXTEL TV Guide at http://www.foxtel.com.au/whats-on/tv-guide confirms that at least the first 2 unaired eps, "The Leak..." and "Monday June," are scheduled for broadcast on Arena on March 25 and April 1, respectively.

Many, many TIA to anyone who UL's these last 8 eps!!

Thanks theburningbush

Thats's right!!

There are many fans of Apartment 23, 

The 8 episodes remaining will be available on TPB ??

Thanks

I hope so. That's why I wrote: "There are many Apartment 23 fans who would be very grateful if these become available at TPB!...Many, many TIA to anyone who UL's these last 8 eps!!"

I've certainly seen many items at TPB that were cap'd from the Oz channel "Arena." I hope these Apt 23 eps are as well.
